We are not going to give up one inch of territory, Sergio Marchionne said. Chrysler said the 2011 versions of its minivans have a new V-6 engine with improved fuel economy. Eric Schmidt said Page also will take the lead product development and technology strategy, while Sergey Brin will focus on strategic projects and have the title co-founder. As executive chairman, Eric Schmidt said he would concentrate on external deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought-leadership that are increasingly important, given Google's global reach, and act as an adviser to Page and Sergey Brin .
